answers.answer: I keep them until they are no longer functional/they no longer fit
I keep them until I no longer enjoy the style of the item
I keep them until they are no longer on trend

answers.answer: Repair the item/ Take it to get repaired
Dispose of the item and/or replace it

question: Do you feel like there are any barriers you preventing you from being more sustainable in your fashion consumption habits?

answers.answer: Yes
No

question: Do you feel like there are any barriers you preventing you from being more sustainable in your fashion consumption habits?

answers.answer: Yes
No

question: Which of these potential barriers is most accurate to you?

answers.answer: Financial concerns ie sustainable fashion brands are too high of a price points
Lack of variety/Restricting my style ie I enjoy wearing many different outfits and to experiment with my style
Lack of information on where to shop ie I do not know which brands I should purchase from and which to avoid

question: In terms of your goals/priorities within your sustainable fashion journey, which of these issues is most relevant to you?

answers.answer: Financial concerns ie sustainable fashion brands are too high of a price points
In terms of your goals/priorities within your sustainable fashion journey, which of these issues is most relevant to you?
Information on where to shop ie I want to know which brands I should purchase from and which to avoid
I already have a lot of pieces in my wardrobe (sustainable or not) and want to get the most wear out of them to prevent further overconsumption
